name: Redream
description:
Redream is a small quirky game made for MAD Game Jam 2021 by team Mistas Sem Fiambre.

In this game, you control a quirky character to relive your wicked dreams over and over again.

Instructions:

  • Clicks to move through different screens
  • Arrow Keys or W/A/S/D to move
  • Arrow Keys or W/A/S/D to rotate the aim and to increase the strength of each blow
  • Space bar to shoot the "ball"

Credits:

José Ribeiro - Programming

Diogo Pereira - Game Design

Beatriz Abreu - Game Art
